title: Vaajra Polki & Emerald Jhumki: Timeless Elegance
materials: Pear-Shaped Emerald. Gold features Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster.
features: A classic jhumka silhouette reimagined with a contemporary flair. Features a large, captivating uncut polki diamond, surrounded by smaller diamonds, in a prong setting. A vibrant green pear-shaped emerald dangles elegantly below, adding a touch of regal charm. The gold framework showcases delicate filigree work.
colors: Predominantly gold with the sparkling white of the polki diamonds and the rich green of the emerald.
occasions: and special occasions. Also ideal for adding a touch of sophistication to contemporary outfits at parties or formal events.
description: This jhumki seamlessly blends traditional craftsmanship with modern aesthetics. The use of uncut polki diamonds gives it a vintage charm, while the clean lines and the emerald enhance its contemporary appeal. It's a durable and timeless piece, crafted with meticulous detail in Hyderabad. The polki diamonds symbolize prosperity and good fortune.
